H0.text: what did albert speer design. New Reich Chancellery

H1.text: what did albert speer design. Nuremberg Rally Grounds

H2.text: what did albert speer design. German Embassy in Moscow

H3.text: what did albert speer design. Volkshalle

A4.text: Over 4,500 people worked in shifts, so that progress could be made around the clock.

A5.text: Speer was given a blank cheque—Hitler stated that the cost of the project was immaterial—and was instructed that the building be of solid construction, and that it be finished by the following January in time for the next New Year's diplomatic reception to be held in the new building.
